729139f-a.folder: McClean Avenue & Malory Avenue, Staten Island, NY
729139f-a.text:
McClean Avenue, south side, between Malory Avenue and Lamport Boulevard. Mr. P. L. Sperr states that the house is commonly reputed to date to colonial days, but was probably erected by R.W. Cameron, on whose estate it was then located. The view is eastward, McClean Avenue being directly to the left of the house.
About 1924
P. L. Sperr
